name: Dr Terrell Okhiria
bio: Dr. Terrell Okhiria is a medical doctor and GP trainee based in North Central London. He holds an MBBS and intercalated BSc from Imperial College London and is certified in advanced aesthetic medicine. With a strong foundation in clinical medicine and a deep understanding of skin physiology, he specialises in regenerative, science-led treatments that support long-term skin health and natural rejuvenation.
